text: Coulombiers is a former commune. It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Sarthe department in the west of France. On 1 January 2019, it was merged into the commune of Fresnay-sur-Sarthe.Arrêté préfectoral 30 November 2018 == References == Category:Former communes in Sarthe
title: Coulombiers, Sarthe
